name: Don't Play in Class
description:
What if someone was trying to stop you from playing a game? What if they were really bad at it?

Here is a game with someone trying to stop you from 'disrupting a learning environment' despite the fact it cannot distinguish between work and play at a glance.

You play as a blue dot dodging red dots while you, the player, must hide that you are playing a game from a wandering robot. Being spotted without your screen hidden (hide with SPACE) or taking a hit by a red projectile raises the suspicion against you. However, while taking damage you are immune to projectiles, but too much damage will cause a game over, but blocking damage with SPACE will stop your movement and negate the projectile immunity. Balance carefully.

WASD: Move

SPACEBAR: Toggle hide screen (essentially Alt Tab)

Mobile is not supported. Firefox/Chrome recommended.
